name: Dodgeball Mayhem
description:
Play Dodge-ball against your friends in a crazy environment! 

This game is in very early development right now! Feedback is much appreciated!

Player 1 Controls: ;
Move: W A S D
Catch: Q
Throw: E

Player 2 Controls:
Move: I J K L
Catch: U
Throw: O

Known Bugs:

  • AI can't lose
  • No Character Select Screen for 1 Player
